content: Is https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib-overview.html#analysis missing the recent advances in complex analysis?
I think there are quite a lot things that got added recently in analysis that are not in that list (Banach-Steinhaus, bornology, locally convex spaces,..)
I thought about adding these, but I haven't found the time yet and implementing math is more fun than writing documentation
I know all to well what you mean
